page.title: 17The cost of a pint (1985)
page.content:
The following information gives the amount of alcohol drunk at the local in one week. Also the price per pint or measure.
Worthington Bitter....4x22gals...72p Blacklebel Larger.....5x22gals...83p Tennents Extra Larger.2x11gals...92p Draught Bass..........5x9gals....74p Mild M&B..............2x11gals...66p Dry Blachthorne Cider.1x11gals...92p
Whisky.................3x75cl.....62p Gin....................3x75cl.....62p Brabdy (Cognac)........1x75cl.....73p Vermouth (Martini).....6x75cl.....60p Vodka..................2x75cl.....62p Pernoo.................1x75cl.....70p Wine...................22xlitres..66p
Cola..18x185ml..36p..lemonade.25gal.. 35p for half pint.
